definitions.definition: the organization of the different elements of a complex body or activity so as to enable them to work together effectively.
examples: both countries agreed to intensify efforts at economic policy coordination

definitions.definition: cooperative effort resulting in an effective relationship.
examples: action groups work in coordination with local groups to end rain forest destruction

definitions.definition: the ability to use different parts of the body together smoothly and efficiently.
examples: changing from one foot position to another requires coordination and balance

definitions.definition: the linking of atoms by coordinate bonds.
